pkgmetadata.longdescription: Readme======``latest`` is a LaTeX-oriented template engine.Basic Usage-----------Run `latest` script from the command line.. code-block:: bash latest template datawhere * `template` is the path to a template file and * `data` is the path to a yaml formatted data file... image:: https://travis-ci.org/bluephlavio/latest.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/bluephlavio/latest
